# PESTO
## *PES*t management assessment *TO*ol

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of PESTO is to provide functions to intake qualitative survey data from the ADOPT-IPM collaborators and create data frame summaries that can be turned into easy-to-interpret visualizations. Watch for the PESTO-VIZ online tool, coming soon...

## Installation

You can install the development version of PESTO from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("vanichols/PESTO")
```
